# itemKey

**Type Property**

A key that specifies the toolbar item associated with the notification.

## Declaration

```swift
static let itemKey: NSToolbarUserInfoKey
```

## Discussion

The value of this key is an [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSToolbarItem] object.
title: itemKey
